Pre-Game Insights: The Grizzlies and Rockets are both in the top three of the Western Conference.
Others: The Grizzlies average 16.3 more points than the Rockets give up.
The Rockets average 1.8 fewer points than the Grizzlies allow to opponents.
Injury updates for both teams: Desmond Bane, Marcus Smart, Santi Aldama, Vince Williams Jr., Ja Morant, GG Jackson II for the Grizzlies, and Tari Eason, Jabari Smith Jr. for the Rockets.
